attributes.action: Put Sudan on the amber list.
attributes.additional_details:
Sudan should be of the red list because compared to other red list countries it doesn’t have such a high rate of infection also it is rolling out it’s vaccinations 
In the past week there has been no deaths and it’s cases are about 156 cases in a week 
As you can see the case there are rapidly dropping . Also the government has failed to explain we Sudan was put on the red list for.
attributes.background: We want Sudan to be removed from the red list and put on the amber list
